conversion_verification.notes: The conversion uses a variable-height wall style (ramped walls) to expose the floor plan details while maintaining 3D depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness, though the sloped exterior wall is a stylistic choice that slightly obscures some geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to layout; room counts, adjacencies, and wall placements match the 1:1 scale of the source plan.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent alignment of furniture assets with the 2D symbols, including the kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic; lighting is effective and supports 3D readability.

detected_errors.description: The sloped cutaway of the exterior walls creates a wedge-shaped profile that isn't standard architectural cutaway, though interior fidelity is maintained.

summary: An accurate 3D translation that maintains highly faithful room layouts and furniture placements despite a unique wedge-shaped wall aesthetic.
